project_id.description: the ID of the project to use for this client. If not specified, the project id will be auto-detected from the credentials

use_base64.description: if true the service account JSON content will be treated as base64 encoded

max_batch_size.description: maximum batch size for each request when reading Firestore data

order_by.description: field(s) to order the results by

order_direction.description: the direction to order the results by when order_by is specified - accepts either asc or desc

Spec.description: Spec is the (nested) spec used by Firestore Source Plugin
